queries.item: CREATE TABLE `?:adls_licenses` ( `license_id` mediumint(8) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `order_id` mediumint(8) NOT NULL , `product_id` mediumint(8) UNSIGNED NOT NULL , `user_id` mediumint(8) UNSIGNED NOT NULL , `created_at` datetime NOT NULL , `updated_at` datetime NOT NULL , `license` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`license_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;

CREATE TABLE `?:adls_license_domains` ( `domain_id` mediumint(8) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `license_id` mediumint(8) UNSIGNED NOT NULL , `domain` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NOT NULL , `created_at` datetime NOT NULL , `updated_at` datetime NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`domain_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;
